docs.title: What is the goal of the project?
docs.text: The core goal of the project is to ease the Resume creation and hosting process.

docs.title: What is it based on?
docs.text: The project is based on the following Open Source tools: - Markdown - MkDocs - Material for MkDocs - GitHub Actions - GitHub Workflows - GitHub Pages - PDF generation (# TODO: Add the PDF generation tool)
